exclusion.criterion: Allergy or intolerance to lidocaine, epinephrine, sulfites, phentolamine, nitrous oxide or topical benzocaine
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no mention of allergy or intolerance

notes: Patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain. She has leukocytosis and a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, abscess or gangrene.
